quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi
quotes.quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.

quotes.author: Oscar Wilde
quotes.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.

quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

quotes.author: Mark Twain
quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

quotes.author: Helen Keller
quotes.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.

quotes.author: Confucius
quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe
quotes.quote: Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.

quotes.author: Walt Disney
quotes.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.

quotes.author: Nelson Mandela
quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.

quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quotes.quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.

quotes.author: Aristotle
quotes.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.

quotes.author: William Shakespeare
quotes.quote: Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and some have greatness thrust upon them.

quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau
quotes.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.

quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt
quotes.quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.

quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quotes.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.

quotes.author: Maya Angelou
quotes.quote: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.

quotes.author: Dr. Seuss
quotes.quote: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.

quotes.author: John F. Kennedy
quotes.quote: Ask not what your country can do for you – ask what you can do for your country.

quotes.author: Dalai Lama
quotes.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.

quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci
quotes.quote: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.

quotes.author: Babe Ruth
quotes.quote: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.

quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer
quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.

quotes.author: Bruce Lee
quotes.quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.

quotes.author: Vince Lombardi
quotes.quote: Winners never quit and quitters never win.

quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey
quotes.quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.

quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin
quotes.quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.

quotes.author: Anne Frank
quotes.quote: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.

quotes.author: Plato
quotes.quote: The beginning is the most important part of the work.

quotes.author: Mother Teresa
quotes.quote: If you judge people, you have no time to love them.

quotes.author: Henry Ford
quotes.quote: Whether you think you can, or you think you can't – you're right.

quotes.author: J.K. Rowling
quotes.quote: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.

quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.
quotes.quote: The time is always right to do what is right.

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw
quotes.quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.

quotes.author: C.S. Lewis
quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.quote: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.

quotes.author: Tony Robbins
quotes.quote: The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment.

quotes.author: A.A. Milne
quotes.quote: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.

quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky
quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.

quotes.author: Victor Hugo
quotes.quote: Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise.

quotes.author: Thomas Edison
quotes.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.

quotes.author: Elon Musk
quotes.quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.

quotes.author: Barack Obama
quotes.quote: The best way to not feel hopeless is to get up and do something.

quotes.author: Mark Zuckerberg
quotes.quote: The biggest risk is not taking any risk.

quotes.author: Peter Drucker
quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.

quotes.author: Winston Churchill
quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

quotes.author: Rumi
quotes.quote: Do not be satisfied with the stories that come before you. Unfold your own myth.

quotes.author: William James
quotes.quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.

quotes.author: Napoleon Hill
quotes.quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.

quotes.author: Stephen Hawking
quotes.quote: However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.

quotes.author: Dale Carnegie
quotes.quote: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.

quotes.author: Socrates
quotes.quote: An unexamined life is not worth living.

quotes.author: Zig Ziglar
quotes.quote: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.

quotes.author: E.E. Cummings
quotes.quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.

quotes.author: Michael Jordan
quotes.quote: I've failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.

quotes.author: Lao Tzu
quotes.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.

quotes.author: Buddha
quotes.quote: You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.

quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh
quotes.quote: What would life be if we had no courage to attempt anything?

quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quotes.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
